title: Mobile Microlearning Course on Multiplication and Division Concepts Using the PMRI Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical concepts and basic understanding of fluid mechanics
context.additional_context: Provides practicing elementary teachers with a self-directed learning environment using mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively explain the concept of multiples through real-life examples (e.g., La Pinta mud phenomenon).
Learners can analyze simulated experimental data from real-world scenarios by applying the flow rate calculation formula (Q=V/t).
Learners can visually and numerically represent the process of solving multiple-related problems using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
